titles.title: Cigarette Litter Prevention Act of 2007
A bill to amend the Federal Cigarette Labeling and Advertising Act with respect to the labeling of cigarette packages, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

term.name: Department of Health and Human Services

bill.summary: 4/19/2007--Introduced. Cigarette Litter Prevention Act of 2007 - Amends the Federal Cigarette Labeling and Advertising Act to prohibit any person from manufacturing, packaging, or importing for sale or distribution within the United States any cigarettes the package of which fails to bear the following statement: "Please dispose of all cigarette waste properly. Do not litter."
